ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] freeeqguides
ygData.msgSnippet: Cause they suck? =P All info in these guides can be found on websites. Most contain logic, some contains the usage of buggs which were plugged years ago and
ygData.messageBody:
Cause they suck? =P All info in these guides can be found on websites. Most contain logic, some contains the usage of buggs which were plugged years ago and others contain what can be found on the web. To me they are worthless.
-----Original Message-----
From: David Langille [mailto:tuxedomystery2000@...]
Sent: den 9 oktober 2002 20:11
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] freeeqguides

no guide to any game is worthless, just most aren't worth much

however, how do you know that these guides aren't worth that much?

 "LAINE. Mikael (Nol)" wrote:

All of these guides are ripoffs and not worth it.
-----Original Message-----
From: David Langille [mailto:tuxedomystery2000@...]
Sent: den 8 oktober 2002 20:38
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] freeeqguides

With all due respect, what is so fun about going around for a week building up money for armor that you desperately want when you could do it in a way that isn't as deadly, would only take you 3-4 days, and would give you more exp in the long run of things, and then the better armor would be something to brag about to other ppl ,and you'd probably get more invites.

 Steven Hulse wrote:

Thank you for posting this. I went to check them out and you know I have to say I was a little dissapointed in the guides. A lot of the information that they contain can be found at almost any EQ related website! It's basically that I'm glad I didn't pay for any of these guides, it's really not worth the money. The only thing I'm truly interested in is making money. Man it sucks trying to get some decent armor when you have no money. I've wondered about the "make Plat at any level" guides and I figured that you would still need to group or partner at some point.

Either way I'm having fun just going along and doing things the old fashioned way. I do suggest going and getting these guides because there were a few things in there that was nice to know about but for any player, especially noobs, I suggest doing it the old fashioned way and go out there and take the lumps and partner with some others. It's funner and you'll feel better knowing that you did it on your own.

I got some good info about Unrest so I think I may go and try it out this week.

--
